value.name: Judge rules for Indianapolis police in black teen’s killing

value.name: They called the police on a 6-year-old. Now, Somerville school leaders are suspending school police programs
value.description: The moratorium, approved nearly unanimously by the Somerville School Committee last week, affects two programs that bring police officers into schools.

value.name: Somerville becomes second city in Massachusetts to remove police from schools
value.description: On Monday, May 17, the Somerville School Committee (SC) voted nearly unanimously to suspend the district’s school/police Memorandum of Understanding (MOU), and for a moratorium of the School Resource Officer (SRO) and Students and Teachers Engage Public Safety (STEPS) programs.

value.name: Should police have a place in schools? School Committee is searching for answers

value.name: Championship rumours: Nottingham Forest, Derby and Sheffield Wednesday all chasing Cardiff City winger
value.description: SHEFFIELD Wednesday new boy Andre Green turned down offers from elsewhere to join the Owls. The winger has spent the first-half of this season as a free agent after leaving Aston Villa in the summer.
